title: Designing Language Pedagogy Using Computer Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental computer skills (document editing, internet searches, etc.)
context.additional_context: Digital devices (tablets, laptops, etc.) are provided, with a focus on integrating computer technology into language education (grammar/vocabulary/speaking)

learning_goals: Participants can design learner-customized language activities using digital tools.
Participants can explain effective methods for integrating multimedia resources (audio/video/images) into language lessons.
Participants can create lesson plans utilizing simple educational software (e.g., quiz-making tools, pronunciation analysis apps).

resources: Educational Software Licenses (Quizlet, Google Classroom, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
